name: Ice Princess - Sweet Sixteen
description:
You’re invited to the most glamorous party of the year - Ice Princess’ Frosty Sweet Sixteen! Prince Charming will be there so make sure to wear your most beautiful winter gown! Choose from tons of frosty-chic outfits and stylish accessories! You can even dress up your royal pet and bring it to the Frosty Sweet Sixteen! Dance the night away with your prince by your side!

Frosty Features:
√ Dress up Ice Princess the most enchanting look of the night!
√ Dance with Prince Charming at the Frosty Sweet Sixteen!
√ Select a royal pet to style for the Frosty Sweet Sixteen!
√ Choose from the fanciest outfits and most stunning accessories!
√ Style your Ice Princess with flawless makeup - choose lipsticks, eyeliners, and more!
√ Relax at the Royal Ice Spa and beautify your Ice Princess with luscious creams!
√ Pose with Prince Charming! Take stunning photos with the Photo Booth!
